mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER(CNO, TRAINERID, CAREERNAME, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, COMMENTS) VALUES( SEQ_CAREER.NEXTVAL, #{trainerId}, #{careerName}, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{comments})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENTS FROM FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER WHERE TRAINERID = #{id} AND COMMENTS IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY CNO DESC
SELECT * FROM FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER WHERE TRAINERID = #{id} ORDER BY CNO
mapper.update: UPDATE FITNESS_TRAINER_CAREER SET CAREERNAME = #{careerName}, STARTDATE = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ENDDATE = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE CNO = #{cno}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FITNESS_PT_RESERVE(RESERVE_NO, T_ID, M_ID, RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME) VALUES( SEQ_RESERVE.NEXTVAL, #{trainerId}, #{memberId}, TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}||' '||#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), NVL2(#{endTime, jdbcType=DATE}, TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}||' '||#{endTime, jdbcType=DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), NULL)
)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FITNESS_PT_RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{reserveDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND START_TIME = TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}||' '||#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND T_ID = #{trainerId} AND ROWNUM >= 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FITNESS_PT_RESERVE WHERE RESERVE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M_ID = #{memberId} AND ROWNUM >= 1
SELECT TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24') FROM FITNESS_PT_RESERVE WHERE T_ID = #{trainerId} AND RESERVE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY START_TIME

SELECT TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'DD') FROM FITNESS_PT_RESERVE WHERE T_ID = #{trainerId} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{year_month} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'DD') >= #{today} GROUP BY RESERVE_DATE ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE
